idea-plugin.name: Call Sequences of Overridden Callbacks Identifier
idea-plugin.description: This plugin finds all the possible call sequences for each overwritten callback. For example, onClick() may call calc1(), which may further call calc2(), so one call sequence is onClick()-->calc1()-->calc2().
